extendedInfo.description: Freedom and control have finally found a way to get along. The Spend Smart app from BillMyParents; itÂ¹s designed with both teens and their parents in mind, and works with the BillMyParents prepaid reloadable  Spend Smart card to help everyone Spend Smart (get the card at the https://www.billmyparents.com/start/).Teens can quickly and easily track their own spending, check balances and purchases and even request money from family members and friends. So, they have the freedom to buy things anywhere Debit MasterCard is accepted and the ability to know whatÂ¹s going on with their money, at all times. The app gives parents the ability to load funds quickly, track teens' spending in real-time and, if needed,instantly lock the card to prevent it from being used. ItÂ¹s a tool that parents can use to help their teen manage their own money with no danger of over-draft fees or credit risk, while also giving them the power and freedom to make smart spending  decisions.The Spend Smart App from BillMyParents. Complete Freedom. Total control. In a card and now in an App, too.

reviews.title: Settings update Issues
reviews.comment: The App never allows me to update my settings, there is always a \"Error Message.\"  Ain\'t nobody got time for that.
